# Wound Paste
## Overview
**Aura** faint conjuration; **CL** x1stxx

**Slot** none

**Price** 50 gp

**Weight** 1/2 lb.

**Description**

Prized by slavers as an affordable way to stop a captive from bleeding to death, a dose of *wound paste* acts as a *[[Stabilize (Spell)|stabilize]]* spell when slathered on a dying creature. Applying *wound paste* is a standard action that provokes an attack of opportunity. A pot of *wound paste* contains 5 doses.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Stabilize (Spell)|stabilize]]*

**Cost** 25 gp

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 125
